author: cziegeler
msg: Further cleanup of CoreUtil and start of new way of starting up Cocoon by using a servlet listener which sets up
the Cocoon container and puts it into the servlet context. This allows to run Cocoon next to other frameworks.

author: smishura
msg: Fixing bug: wrong interpretation of encoded year by UTCTime

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1463: Resolve javadoc warnings in BrokeredCallableStatement40

author: ruchithf
msg: Modified the SAML token issuer and the configuration to create its own assertions without using the SAMLIssuer from WSS4J
